Package world

Class ActorWorld

java.lang.Object
world.World<GameObject>
world.ActorWorld
Direct Known Subclasses:
BotWorld
public class ActorWorld extends World<GameObject>
An ActorWorld is occupied by actors.
This class is not tested on the AP CS A and AB exams.
